1.「おお <pc>。来てくれたか。| じつはな そちに 頼みがある。| これが 余: Oh, <pc>. I need you to do|something for me. This will be my last|request.

2.「余の最後の頼みとは……| 我が祖国 ガテリア皇国を探す| 手伝いをしてほしいの: My last request... I ask you to help me find|my homeland, the Kingdom of Gateria.

3.「……みなまで申すな。| ガテリアが すでに存在しないのは 重々承知。| しかし: ... Until now. The fact that the gateria no|longer exists is a heavy... But...

4.「ウルベア同様 朽ち果てた姿の……。| そう。ガテリア皇国の 遺跡ならば| 見つ:
Like Urber, it is in a state of decay. . If|the ruins of the Imperial Palace of Gateria|are to be found, then perhaps they can be|
|found, can't they?

5.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。| かつて 父上や母上 そして……| リウ老師と: I wanted to take a look. I wanted to see|what my father and mother and... Father,|Mother and Master Liu.

6.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: The throne room of the fatherland is the|home of those closest to us. If I can touch|their memories, I can walk again.

7.「ウルベア地下遺跡のある場所から見て| ガテリアの遺跡は この大陸の西の果てにあ:
From the location of the Urbea underground|ruins, the ruins of Gateria lie to the east|of the Boronus lava flow at the far west end|
|of this continent.

8.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ| 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。: Find the ruins of Gateria and take me to the|throne room. Please, will you grant me this|last request?

9.「そうか！ やってくれるか！| 本当に…… 本当に| そちに 出会えて よかった: Oh, yeah! Will you do it! I really... I'm|really glad I found you!

10.「それでは ボロヌス溶岩流に行き| ガテリアの遺跡を探すとしよう。| 余は そち: So, we'll go to the Boronus lava flow and|look for the remains of Gateria. I'll follow|you.

12.「話を聞いてりゃ アンタ……。| 身寄りが いねえみたいですなッ！: I'm listening to you. You don't have any|relatives.

13.「もし 行くあてがねえんなら| 養子にでもしてやるでごぜえますよッ！| ここを: If you have nowhere else to go, I'll adopt|you! Think of this place as your home!

15.「カッ カン違いしねえでくだせえッ！| わしは アンタの その…ガラクタの知識を: Don't take this the wrong way! I'm not|your... I'm just buying your crap knowledge!

16.「ダストン殿……。| 見かけによらず 貴公は 優しいのであるな。| その申し出: Mr. Duston. You are kinder than you appear.|I'm in your debt.

17.「……じゃが 余は 行かねばならぬ。| 祖国の今を 見届けねば 余の時間は| 止: ... But I have to go. I must see what my|country has become, or I feel as if my time|has come to a standstill.

18.「<pc>よ。それでは 参ろうか。| 目指すは ボロヌス溶岩流の東に眠る| ガテ: Then let's go. Our goal is to find the|relics of the Gatelian Empire, which lie to|the east of the lava flow of the Boronus.

19.「……ムムッ！| そちは 他の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており| 余の頼みは 受け: ... Mwah! I'm afraid you have too many other|people asking you to do me a favor.

20.「まあ こちらは 一刻を争うわけでもない。| 急ぎの依頼を 片付けたら| 余を: Well, we're on a clock here. Help me with|this when I finish up with the urgent|business.

21.「……そうかえ。| ならば いたしかたなし。| そちの気が変わるまで 待つことに: ... So . Well, then, I'll be damned. We'll|wait until you change your mind.

22.「おお <pc>。| 余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡を探す| 手伝いをしてくれる気: Oh, <pc>, you've decided to help|me find the remains of my homeland, the|Kingdom of Gateria?

23.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。| かつて 父上や母上 そして……| リウ老師と: I wanted to take a look. I wanted to see|what my father and mother and... Father,|Mother and Master Liu.

24.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: The throne room of the fatherland is the|home of those closest to us. If I can touch|their memories, I can walk again.

25.「ウルベア地下遺跡のある場所から見て| ガテリアの遺跡は この大陸の西の果てにあ:
From the location of the Urbea underground|ruins, the ruins of Gateria lie to the east|of the Boronus lava flow at the far west end|
|of this continent.

26.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ| 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。: Find the ruins of Gateria and take me to the|throne room. Please, will you grant me this|last request?

27.「余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡は| きっと この大陸の西の果てにある| ボロヌス:
The ruins of my homeland, the Kingdom of|Gateria, must lie to the east of the Boronus|lava flow at the western end of this|
|continent.

28.「余と共に ボロヌス溶岩流に行き| ガテリアの遺跡を見つけたら| 奥の玉座の間ま:
You will go with me to the Boronus lava|flow, and when you find the ruins of|Gateria, you will take me to the throne room|
|in the back.

29.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: The throne room of the fatherland is the|home of those closest to us. If I can touch|their memories, I can walk again.

30.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。| 頼んだぞよ <pc>。: This is my last request. I'm counting on|you, <pc>.

31.「そちのおかげで ボロヌス溶岩流に眠る| ガテリア皇国の遺跡は 見つかったぞよ。:
Thanks to you, the ruins of the Kingdom of|Gateria, lying in the lava flow of the|Boronus, have been found. It's truly awe-|
|inspiring.

32.「あとは その奥にあるはずの| 玉座の間まで 余を 連れていってたもれ。: Now you just take me to the throne room,|which is supposed to be behind that.

33.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。| 彼らの思い出に ふれることができれ: The throne room of the fatherland is the|home of those closest to us. If I can touch|their memories, I can walk again.

34.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。| 頼んだぞよ <pc>。: This is my last request. I'm counting on|you, <pc>.

35.「おお……！ ついに……| ついに 見つけてくれたのじゃな……。| <pc>よ…: Oh...! Finally... You finally found me.|<pc>.

36.「かように 変わり果てても| 悲しいほど 余には わかるぞえ……。: Sadly, I know how much it has changed.

37.「まちがいない。| この地こそ 我が祖国ガテリアじゃ……。: The town. This is our homeland, Gateria.

38.「祖国といえど 父上も母上も……| 親しい者は 皆 すでに ここにはおらぬ。|: Even in my homeland, my father, my mother...|Everyone close to me is already here. I knew|it would be hard.

39.「……さあ <pc>。| 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。| きっと こ: ... Take me to the throne room. I'm sure|it's in there.

41.「この部屋こそ 余の思い出が詰まった| ガテリア皇国の玉座の間……。| ついに: This is the throne room of the Kingdom of|Gateria, where I have many fond memories. At|last you've arrived.

42.「……こうしていると 在りし日のガテリアが| 目に 浮かぶようじゃ。: ... I can just picture the old days of|Gateria in my mind's eye.

43.「……父上が 威風堂々と玉座に座ると| その隣で 母上が 余に笑いかけた。| そ: ... Father sits majestically on his throne,|while Mother giggles with him. And then...

44.「決まった時間になると リウ老師が| 嬉しそうに 余を迎えにくる……。: At the appointed time, Master Liu happily|comes to pick me up.

45.「なんと… なんと懐かしく……。| はかない光景なのじゃ……。: How... How nostalgic. What a fleeting scene.

47.「余が ここに来た 本当の理由は……: The real reason I'm here is

50.「ど どこから わいて 出おった！？| かような お化けフンコロガシ……| 余の: Where did it come from? Such a ghostly dung|beetle... I didn't see any in my gatoria!

51.「<cs_pchero> 頼むッ！！| 神聖な玉座の間を汚す 不届き者の| フン: <cs_pchero> Please! Strike down the|treacherous dung beetle that defiles the|hallowed throne room!

52.「よいか <cs_pchero>！| あの お化けフンコロガシを見かけたら| 次: Next time you see that ghostly dung beetle,|you'll show me what you're made of!

54.「で 出たぁぁぁッ！！| 頼んだぞよ <cs_pchero>！！: And there it is! I'm asking you,|<cs_pchero>!

55.「おお！ 不届きな お化けフンコロガシを| 見事 成敗してくれたようじゃな！|: Oh! I see you've successfully vanquished the|treacherous dung beetle! Way to go,|<cs_pchero>!

56.「……かような化け物が すみつくとは| 本当に ガテリアは 時代から| 見捨てら: ... The gateria has truly been abandoned by|the times, that such a monster should|inhabit it.

57.「……<cs_pchero>よ。| 今こそ 余が ここへ来た| 本当の理由を話そ: ... Now is the time to tell you the real|reason I'm here.

58.「余は……| ここで 自らの生を 終えようと思う。: I'm... I will end my life here.

59.「止めないでたもれ……！| 大事な者たちとの思い出に ふれながら| この世を去る: Don't stop me. If I can leave this world|with the memories of those I love...

60.「そちには 本当に世話になった。| 心の底から 感謝してるぞよ。| では さらば: I'm really grateful to you. Thank you from|the bottom of my heart. Farewell, then.

63.「魔神兵……！？| なぜ あの魔神兵が ガテリアにおる！？: Demon soldiers...! Why is that Demon God|Soldier in Gateria?

64.「まさか リウ老師か！？| この中に リウ老師が入っておるのか！？| 早く… 早: No way. Master Liu? Is Master Liu in here?|Quickly... Quick, show me what's inside!

67.「ふふふ……。やはり……な。| 魔神兵の中は もぬけのカラ……。| もう リウ老: Hmmm. I knew it. The demon soldiers are|empty inside. Master Liu is no longer with|us.

68.「……これは リウ老師の手紙か！？| 老師が 余に 手紙を……！: ... Is this Master Liu's letter? The Maester|wrote to me!

69.「……親愛なる我が主 ビャン・ダオさま。| リウにございます。: ... Dear Lord Byan Da ... My dear Lord Byang|Da Liu.

70.「……ビャン皇子を魔神兵に乗せた後| 私は このガテリアまで 戻ってまいりました: ... After I took Prince Byan to the Demon|Army, I came back here to Gateria. To keep|my promise to meet the prince in the future.

71.「……しかし 私は 魔神兵に乗れなかった。| 皇子の後を追って 未来へ行くという: ... But I can't ride a demon soldier. I|couldn't choose to follow the prince into|the future.

73.「……皇子の生きる未来に| 正しい文明の姿を 取り戻すため| この身を賭して 戦:
... I have decided to fight with all my|might to restore the correct image of|civilization to the future where the prince|
|will live.

75.「ドワーフたちが 同じ過ちを繰り返したとき| あなたならば きっと 正しき道へと: When the Dwarves make the same mistakes|again, you will be able to lead your people|to the right path.

77.「……ビャンさま。あなたが 成人したら| とっておきの技術を 教えるという約束を: ... Vya. Do you remember that I promised to|teach you a special skill when you came of|age?

78.「今こそ その約束を果たすとき……。| さあ 魔神兵の中に入っているモノを| お: Now is the time to fulfill that promise.|Now, please take what's inside the genie.

79.「これは…………。植物のタネ……？: This is . Seeds of a plant...?

80.「……かつて ドワーフたちは| 他の種族と同じく 自らの手で タネを植え| その: ... In the past, dwarves, like other races,|planted their own seeds and rejoiced in the|harvest.

81.「……しかし 我らは 高度な技術におぼれ| 自らのチカラで 成しとげる よろこび:
... But we are so drowned in technology that|we have lost the pleasure of using our own|strength... We've lost sight of true|
|civilization.

82.「私が ビャンさまに託したかった技術とは……| 自らのチカラで 生き抜く術だった: I wanted to entrust my skills to Master|Byan. The art of surviving on one's own|strength.

83.「ビャンさま…… どうか お元気で……。| あなたとの約束を守れなかった| 私め: Master Byan... Please be well. Forgive me|for not keeping my promise to you.

84.「老師……。そなたは 何も わかっておらぬ。| 余が欲しかったのは こんな手紙で: Master. You don't understand anything. This|is not the letter I wanted. Not this letter.

85.「リウ老師……。余は ただ 一目だけでも| そなたに 会いたかったのじゃ……。: Master Liu. I only wanted to see you at|least once.

86.「……だが その思いは 受け取ったぞ。| リウ老師よ……。: ... But I'll take your thoughts. Master Liu.

87.「……そなたは 望んでおったのだな。| 技術に身をまかせた ゆがんだ時代を終わら:
... You wanted this. You wanted an end to|the warped age of technology and for the|world to become exactly what it is today.|
|... . I have decided to live|in this time. ... I wanted to see it. I|wanted to see the world that Master Liu|
|wanted. I couldn't understand Master Liu's|teachings just from reading this letter. But|now I do. Because you and Chili taught me|
|the importance of living by our own strength|and not by technology alone.

88.「<cs_pchero>。そちには 本当に世話になった。| 感謝しても しきれぬ: I'm really grateful to you. I can't thank|you enough, but this is the least I can do.|Take it.

89.「……余は これから リウ老師の教えに従い| 旅に出ようと思う。この手で タネを:
... I will now embark on a journey in|accordance with the teachings of Master Liu.|With my hands to plant the seeds, with my|
|feet to find my place.

90.「ふふふ……。そちたちのおかげで| 止まっていた余の時間が 動きだしたようじゃ。: Mmm-hmm. Thanks to you, my time has begun to|move. I'm so excited to meet new people!

91.「それでは また会おう！ <cs_pchero>よ！| ガラクタ城の皆にも よろ: Well then, I'll see you again!|<cs_pchero>! Tell everyone at the|junkyard I said hi!
